body:
> Please look at my comment, thx.

OK, I will modify dataTypeName to the type supported by the database. But I found that postgresql supports complex and array. Do we need to support it?

Hi @bharathikannan-zarget , @kimmking , I understand **default table strategy with none** config only can be used after 5.0.0 version.

reference issue: #4276 .
reference pr: #4369 .
Hi @xfyang1988 , please reference this issue #3676 . Maybe they are same question.
@xfyang1988  I suggest you can upgrade the version to 4.0.0 stable version.

> @xfyang1988 I suggest you can upgrade the version to 4.0.0 stable version.

"sharding-core-parse-common" does not have version 4.0.0?
OK.

Hi @techzhou 
`component` is a key word but not a reserved word of MySQL. 
Sorry to say it is a bug, and we will fix it ASAP.

Thanks for your feedback, good job. ðŸ™‚
Ok, i can support mysql and postgresql first.
@tuohai666 Three rows return for Problem 1. The same problem when I used  the version 4.0.0.
